alert.note: Alert for Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Air Stagnation Advisory issued January 31 at 12:06PM PST until February 03 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...An extended period of stagnant air, with light winds and little vertical mixing. * WHERE...Portions of south central, southwest and west central Idaho and northeast and southeast Oregon. * WHEN...Until 1 PM MST Friday, and this time may be extended. * IMPACTS...Periods of air stagnation can lead to the buildup of pollutants near the surface. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be strong enough today, Wednesday, and Thursday afternoons in portions of the Upper Treasure Valley and Western Magic Valley to limit stagnation. However, parts of the zones will experience stagnant air and were therefore included in this advisory.
info.instruction: An Air Stagnation Advisory concerns itself with meteorological conditions only. For more information on air pollution in Idaho, visit website www.deq.idaho.gov. For Oregon, visit website www.oregon.gov/deq. If possible, reduce or eliminate activities that contribute to air pollution, such as outdoor burning, and the use of residential wood burning devices. Reduce vehicle trips and vehicle idling as much as possible.

area.areaDesc: Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley
